---
title: "all taylor swift songs"
description: |
  Analysis of all Taylor Swift songs data from TidyTuesday
author: Jo Hardin
date: February 12, 2025
format: html
---

```{r}

library(readr) 
taylor_all_songs <- read_csv("taylor_all_songs.csv")
```

```{r}

library(ggplot2)

taylor_all_songs |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = danceability, y = energy)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = album_name), na.rm = TRUE) +
  labs(
    title = "Danceability and Energy of All Taylor Songs",
    x = "Danceability", 
    y = "Energy"
  ) + theme_gray()
  
```
